override_description.last_approved_text: Work provides a living wage, and the promise of homes for labourers will attract people to the area seeking stability against chaos.

building_chains.override_description: Work provides a living wage, and the promise of homes for labourers will attract people to the area seeking stability against chaos.

override_description.last_approved_text: Privately-run workshops produce finely-crafted artistic items, boosting your economy from the industry and commerce generated.

building_chains.override_description: Privately-run workshops produce finely-crafted artistic items, boosting your economy from the industry and commerce generated.

override_description.last_approved_text: State workshops provide economic stability through industry and can be further developed to provide materials for construction or to mint currency.

building_chains.override_description: State workshops provide economic stability through industry and can be further developed to provide materials for construction or to mint currency.

override_description.last_approved_text: Without inheriting authority, wealth's greatest use is for attaining power, so the brave can serve China regardless of their heritage.

building_chains.override_description: Without inheriting authority, wealth's greatest use is for attaining power, so the brave can serve China regardless of their heritage.

override_description.last_approved_text: The Zhong combine the administrative experience of their Yuan lineage with the vigour of a new dynasty carved out of sheer ambition.

building_chains.override_description: The Zhong combine the administrative experience of their Yuan lineage with the vigour of a new dynasty carved out of sheer ambition.

override_description.last_approved_text: The administration office is the seat of power in the commandery, and the decisions and statutes made here determine the destiny of the realm.

building_chains.override_description: The administration office is the seat of power in the commandery, and the decisions and statutes made here determine the destiny of the realm.

override_description.last_approved_text: Bureaucracy courses through the blood of the Yuan family, resulting in an efficient and experienced administration run by the finest officials.

building_chains.override_description: Bureaucracy courses through the blood of the Yuan family, resulting in an efficient and experienced administration run by the finest officials.

override_description.last_approved_text: Divergent paths grant new opportunities - administration of the Han Empire, sanctuary for the expelled, or riches from banditry.

building_chains.override_description: Divergent paths grant new opportunities - administration of the Han Empire, sanctuary for the expelled, or riches from banditry.

override_description.last_approved_text: Rule by the sword to evade the ambiguities and trappings of bureaucracy; this government is run with the discipline of a military command.

building_chains.override_description: Rule by the sword to evade the ambiguities and trappings of bureaucracy; this government is run with the discipline of a military command.

override_description.last_approved_text: The teachings of Confucius educate the people on how to cultivate their inner and outer life, so that they and their works are greatly improved.

building_chains.override_description: The teachings of Confucius educate the people on how to cultivate their inner and outer life, so that they and their works are greatly improved.

override_description.last_approved_text: Taoism teaches the people how to be content; this happiness is evident in everything the people produce.

building_chains.override_description: Taoism teaches the people how to be content; this happiness is evident in everything the people produce.

override_description.last_approved_text: A well-organised system improves the efficiency of tax collection across rural areas, where administrative matters are often harder to carry out.

building_chains.override_description: A well-organised system improves the efficiency of tax collection across rural areas, where administrative matters are often harder to carry out.

override_description.last_approved_text: A Shu-Han tax administration oversees the collection of taxes with the good of the people in mind, ensuring all pay a fair and equal share.

building_chains.override_description: A Shu-Han tax administration oversees the collection of taxes with the good of the people in mind, ensuring all pay a fair and equal share.

encyclopedia_description.last_approved_text: It is only fair to be granted the spoils of your efforts.

building_chains.encyclopedia_description: It is only fair to be granted the spoils of your efforts.

override_description.last_approved_text: Bandits have little time for the hypocrisy of so-called warlords; these tribute buildings provide a place for vassals to pay their respect – in gold.

building_chains.override_description: Bandits have little time for the hypocrisy of so-called warlords; these tribute buildings provide a place for vassals to pay their respect – in gold.

override_description.last_approved_text: Harbours provide livelihoods and trade and can be further developed with an eye on greater profits or larger fishing hauls.

building_chains.override_description: Harbours provide livelihoods and trade and can be further developed with an eye on greater profits or larger fishing hauls.

override_description.last_approved_text: Weary travellers pay handsomely for a place to rest, and should tea be available, will learn much from contemplation while taking refreshment.

building_chains.override_description: Weary travellers pay handsomely for a place to rest, and should tea be available, will learn much from contemplation while taking refreshment.

override_description.last_approved_text: Every enlightened and civilised society must offer accommodation for travellers. Where tea is available, conversation and wisdom surely follow – for a price, of course.

building_chains.override_description: Every enlightened and civilised society must offer accommodation for travellers. Where tea is available, conversation and wisdom surely follow – for a price, of course.

override_description.last_approved_text: Promising officials are educated in the classics and refinement of character, leaving as talented gentlemen to improve the world with their knowledge.

building_chains.override_description: Promising officials are educated in the classics and refinement of character, leaving as talented gentlemen to improve the world with their knowledge.

override_description.last_approved_text: The Kong family rightfully claim Confucius as an ancestor, and fittingly, their schools promote enlightenment and poetry for financial and cultural betterment.

building_chains.override_description: The Kong family rightfully claim Confucius as an ancestor, and fittingly, their schools promote enlightenment and poetry for financial and cultural betterment.

override_description.last_approved_text: A marketplace provides entrepreneurs a place to sell local wares and goods imported from along trade routes.

building_chains.override_description: A marketplace provides entrepreneurs a place to sell local wares and goods imported from along trade routes.

override_description.last_approved_text: As trade thrives, the development of trade ports takes advantage of the new commercial opportunities to increase your income.

building_chains.override_description: As trade thrives, the development of trade ports takes advantage of the new commercial opportunities to increase your income.

override_description.last_approved_text: Conscription raises troops from the population for the great cause, increasing the replenishment and the mustering of bodies across your commanderies.

building_chains.override_description: Conscription raises troops from the population for the great cause, increasing the replenishment and the mustering of bodies across your commanderies.

override_description.last_approved_text: Conscription raises troops from the population, improving the efficiency of agricultural garrisons and increasing replenishment across your commanderies.

building_chains.override_description: Conscription raises troops from the population, improving the efficiency of agricultural garrisons and increasing replenishment across your commanderies.

override_description.last_approved_text: Even with a standing army, the realm’s stability must be assured by drawing bodies from the population – willingly or otherwise!

building_chains.override_description: Even with a standing army, the realm’s stability must be assured by drawing bodies from the population – willingly or otherwise!

override_description.last_approved_text: Military forges produce improved equipment for your troops, the materials brought to forge the equipment providing a boost to your income.

building_chains.override_description: Military forges produce improved equipment for your troops, the materials brought to forge the equipment providing a boost to your income.

override_description.last_approved_text: A military infrastructure is vital for supplying your troops; it can be further developed to either increase stockpiles or cause attrition for enemy trespassers.

building_chains.override_description: A military infrastructure is vital for supplying your troops; it can be further developed to either increase stockpiles or cause attrition for enemy trespassers.

override_description.last_approved_text: Xiliang supply lines use foraging techniques and mounted troops to deliver provisions, while simultaneously disrupting supply routes for trespassing armies.

building_chains.override_description: Xiliang supply lines use foraging techniques and mounted troops to deliver provisions, while simultaneously disrupting supply routes for trespassing armies.

override_description.last_approved_text: Whether a shelter, lair or stronghold, bandits need somewhere to gather and organise if they are to become an army.

building_chains.override_description: Whether a shelter, lair or stronghold, bandits need somewhere to gather and organise if they are to become an army.

override_description.last_approved_text: Government support provides homes for workers and can further benefit the land with improved irrigation or new tools for farming.

building_chains.override_description: Government support provides homes for workers and can further benefit the land with improved irrigation or new tools for farming.

override_description.last_approved_text: Grain storage protects the harvest from thieves, pests and natural disasters, providing food during sieges and supply for your armies.

building_chains.override_description: Grain storage protects the harvest from thieves, pests and natural disasters, providing food during sieges and supply for your armies.

override_description.last_approved_text: The land is rife with potential; it can be developed to accommodate markets for trading or farms to increase crop yields.

building_chains.override_description: The land is rife with potential; it can be developed to accommodate markets for trading or farms to increase crop yields.

override_description.last_approved_text: The Tian guides us, through understanding of the self, to a life beyond.

building_chains.override_description: The Tian guides us, through understanding of the self, to a life beyond.

override_description.last_approved_text: Embrace effortless action to achieve harmony with nature.

building_chains.override_description: Embrace effortless action to achieve harmony with nature.

override_description.last_approved_text: Iron is heaven’s will made manifest, and this area is rich with it, boosting your industry and improving the quality of weapons.

building_chains.override_description: Iron is heaven’s will made manifest, and this area is rich with it, boosting your industry and improving the quality of weapons.

override_description.last_approved_text: A warrior on horseback is worth several on foot; the horses bred and trained by the tribespeople here are more effective in battle.

building_chains.override_description: A warrior on horseback is worth several on foot; the horses bred and trained by the tribespeople here are more effective in battle.

override_description.last_approved_text: Copper is as flexible in its uses as in its actual physical properties and can be mined to make weapons, art and coins.

building_chains.override_description: Copper is as flexible in its uses as in its actual physical properties and can be mined to make weapons, art and coins.

override_description.last_approved_text: Animal tamers who know the hearts of beasts as well as people recognise and encourage potential in them, raising steeds worthy of heroes.

building_chains.override_description: Animal tamers who know the hearts of beasts as well as people recognise and encourage potential in them, raising steeds worthy of heroes.

override_description.last_approved_text: Armourers who are masters in their field create pieces fit for the greatest warriors and occasionally even an emperor.

building_chains.override_description: Armourers who are masters in their field create pieces fit for the greatest warriors and occasionally even an emperor.

override_description.last_approved_text: Weaponsmiths who dedicate everything to their art at the expense of all else forge weapons worthy of the mightiest talents.

building_chains.override_description: Weaponsmiths who dedicate everything to their art at the expense of all else forge weapons worthy of the mightiest talents.

override_description.last_approved_text: Jade is sought by those with an eye for beauty; the skill needed reserves it for those with expensive tastes.

building_chains.override_description: Jade is sought by those with an eye for beauty; the skill needed reserves it for those with expensive tastes.

override_description.last_approved_text: New and dependable tools reduce physical effort and increase productivity, improving the results of labour.

building_chains.override_description: New and dependable tools reduce physical effort and increase productivity, improving the results of labour.

override_description.last_approved_text: Salt is the mineral of life and commerce; a staple that is always in demand, providing an industry that attracts workers to the area.

building_chains.override_description: Salt is the mineral of life and commerce; a staple that is always in demand, providing an industry that attracts workers to the area.

override_description.last_approved_text: Silk is one of China’s finest riches; a desirable commodity both in and outside of China for those who can pay handsomely for its luxuries.

building_chains.override_description: Silk is one of China’s finest riches; a desirable commodity both in and outside of China for those who can pay handsomely for its luxuries.

override_description.last_approved_text: A little spice transforms the humblest meal; it is a valuable commodity for trade and sale in local markets.

building_chains.override_description: A little spice transforms the humblest meal; it is a valuable commodity for trade and sale in local markets.

override_description.last_approved_text: Ports are the tributaries of healthy trade and can be further developed to increase the import and export of goods.

building_chains.override_description: Ports are the tributaries of healthy trade and can be further developed to increase the import and export of goods.

override_description.last_approved_text: Fertile soil and light rainfall lends this area to growing grain, providing work and food for the people.

building_chains.override_description: Fertile soil and light rainfall lends this area to growing grain, providing work and food for the people.

override_description.last_approved_text: Soldiers farm the land to supply food for your armies, simultaneously defending it and increasing the food yield in the area.

building_chains.override_description: Soldiers farm the land to supply food for your armies, simultaneously defending it and increasing the food yield in the area.

override_description.last_approved_text: The heavy rainfall here is perfect for growing rice, providing the necessary work, food and income.

building_chains.override_description: The heavy rainfall here is perfect for growing rice, providing the necessary work, food and income.

override_description.last_approved_text: Soldiers farm the land to supply food for your armies, simultaneously defending it and increasing the food yield in the area.

building_chains.override_description: Soldiers farm the land to supply food for your armies, simultaneously defending it and increasing the food yield in the area.

override_description.last_approved_text: The sea provides, be it food or income; sold at market or served at the table, the fish caught here benefit all.

building_chains.override_description: The sea provides, be it food or income; sold at market or served at the table, the fish caught here benefit all.

override_description.last_approved_text: Animals, a resource in themselves, have many uses. Rearing livestock provides a reliable source of food and income for the people.

building_chains.override_description: Animals, a resource in themselves, have many uses. Rearing livestock provides a reliable source of food and income for the people.

override_description.last_approved_text: Bamboo thrives in this area’s climate; the cultivation of the timber makes construction here less expensive.

building_chains.override_description: Bamboo thrives in this area’s climate; the cultivation of the timber makes construction here less expensive.

override_description.last_approved_text: This area is heavily forested with pine trees; this abundant source of timber makes construction here less expensive.

building_chains.override_description: This area is heavily forested with pine trees; this abundant source of timber makes construction here less expensive.

override_description.last_approved_text: Tea is aromatic, calming and aids contemplation; the harvesting of the tea plants here will bring much income to the area.

building_chains.override_description: Tea is aromatic, calming and aids contemplation; the harvesting of the tea plants here will bring much income to the area.

override_description.last_approved_text: Industry and commerce can be improved by producing finely-crafted artistic items that also protect against evil and promote the Tao.

building_chains.override_description: Industry and commerce can be improved by producing finely-crafted artistic items that also protect against evil and promote the Tao.

override_description.last_approved_text: Economic stability through industry lends resources to the Yellow Turban cause.

building_chains.override_description: Economic stability through industry lends resources to the Yellow Turban cause.

override_description.last_approved_text: To gain traction, a movement needs organisation and a place in which to plan.

building_chains.override_description: To gain traction, a movement needs organisation and a place in which to plan.

override_description.last_approved_text: By educating the people in the Way of Reason, corruption is eradicated and harmony established.

building_chains.override_description: By educating the people in the Way of Reason, corruption is eradicated and harmony established.

encyclopedia_description.last_approved_text: Healer of the poor in the rural villages of the provincial lands.

override_description.last_approved_text: Before growth can happen, sickness must be cured.

building_chains.override_description: Before growth can happen, sickness must be cured.

override_description.last_approved_text: Education offers knowledge for the enlightenment of all, so that things are learned and understood more easily.

building_chains.override_description: Education offers knowledge for the enlightenment of all, so that things are learned and understood more easily.

override_description.last_approved_text: Make room for nature and pleasure.

building_chains.override_description: Make room for nature and pleasure.

override_description.last_approved_text: The promise of homes for labourers will attract people seeking stability against chaos.

building_chains.override_description: The promise of homes for labourers will attract people seeking stability against chaos.

override_description.last_approved_text: A little refreshment can add much needed perspective.

building_chains.override_description: A little refreshment can add much needed perspective.

override_description.last_approved_text: Communal trade provides a place to sell local wares and goods imported from along trade routes.

building_chains.override_description: Communal trade provides a place to sell local wares and goods imported from along trade routes.

override_description.last_approved_text: Communal trade provides a place to sell local wares and goods imported from along trade routes.

building_chains.override_description: Communal trade provides a place to sell local wares and goods imported from along trade routes.

override_description.last_approved_text: A call for the people to rise in resistance, increasing recruitment and replenishment across commanderies.

building_chains.override_description: A call for the people to rise in resistance, increasing recruitment and replenishment across commanderies.

override_description.last_approved_text: Forges produce improved equipment for your troops, the materials boost to your income.

building_chains.override_description: Forges produce improved equipment for your troops, the materials boost to your income.

override_description.last_approved_text: A recruitment infrastructure is vital for swelling the ranks of the resistance.

building_chains.override_description: A recruitment infrastructure is vital for swelling the ranks of the resistance.

override_description.last_approved_text: When fighting a greater opponent, remain flexible and use cunning and surprise.

building_chains.override_description: When fighting a greater opponent, remain flexible and use cunning and surprise.

override_description.last_approved_text: The land is rife with potential and can be developed to accommodate farms and increase crop yields.

building_chains.override_description: The land is rife with potential and can be developed to accommodate farms and increase crop yields.

override_description.last_approved_text: Look after those who work the land and they will provide for the entire populace.

building_chains.override_description: Look after those who work the land and they will provide for the entire populace.

override_description.last_approved_text: Under heaven, all people are equal.

building_chains.override_description: Under heaven, all people are equal.

override_description.last_approved_text: Taxes are immutable, funding invaluable public works and infrastructure. The people, however, do not see things the same way.

building_chains.override_description: Taxes are immutable, funding invaluable public works and infrastructure. The people, however, do not see things the same way.

override_description.last_approved_text: Laws are the pillars that hold civilisation aloft. Without them we succumb to corruption, baser instincts and chaos.

building_chains.override_description: Laws are the pillars that hold civilisation aloft. Without them we succumb to corruption, baser instincts and chaos.
